title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Liberal MP Dave Sharma believes the push for a call on climate change is one where "people have elevated symbolism, words and language over substance". A number of MPs from both sides of the aisle are seeking to press the government to formally announce a national climate emergency. "Calling things a term or not doesn't change the nature of the policy, so let's have a debate about the policy, let's have a debate about emissions reductions targets... but let's have a debate about what we label these things," the member for Wentworth said. Image: News Corp Australia
